title: Certaine epistles of Tully verbally translated: together with a short treatise, containing an order of instructing youth in grammer, and withall the use and benefite of verball translations
author: Cicero, Marcus Tullius.
publisher: Printed [by N. Okes] for the Company of Stationers,
notes: Selected by Johannes Sturm. Translated and edited by William Haine.
Compiler's, editor's, and printer's names from STC.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Running title reads: Tullie's epistles verbally translated.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
